name: mil-tracker
description: Desktop app for defense equipment & personnel tracking

scripts.dev: concurrently -k "cross-env PORT=5123 HOSTNAME=127.0.0.1 DATABASE_URL=file:./data/mil.db next dev -p 5123" "wait-on tcp:5123 && electron ."
scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.start: concurrently -k "cross-env PORT=5123 HOSTNAME=127.0.0.1 DATABASE_URL=file:./data/mil.db next start -p 5123" "wait-on tcp:5123 && electron ."
scripts.dist:win: npm run prisma:generate && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis
scripts.dist:win:zip: npm run prisma:generate && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win zip
scripts.dist:win:dir: npm run prisma:generate && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --dir -w
scripts.dist:win:portable: npm run prisma:generate && npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --win portable
scripts.dist:mac: npm run prisma:generate && npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO=false electron-builder --mac dmg zip
scripts.dist:mac:universal: npm run prisma:generate && npm run build && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO=false electron-builder --mac universal
scripts.dist:mac:signed: npm run prisma:generate && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip
scripts.db:init: cross-env DATABASE_URL=file:../data/mil.db prisma migrate dev --schema=prisma/schema.prisma --name init && cross-env DATABASE_URL=file:./data/mil.db prisma generate
